overview_of_class: Catalog description: Design and prototyping of analog and digital electronic circuits using semiconductor devices: diodes, transistors, opamps, logic chips, etc. Optical and other sensors, power electronics, filters, and feedback control. Intended for engineers in all disciplines. Extensive hands-on construction and debugging.
name: Electronics Design
subject: MECH_ENG
